revision.text:
{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Hi-Speed USB 2.0 7-Port Hub |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Belkin |model = F5U237 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = 3 |subrevision = (Silver) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/09/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Belkin_F5U237_rev_3_(Silver) |sernum = |series = |usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Female Mini-B |size_class = desktop |vendor_id = 050d |device_id = 0237 |vendor_id2 = |device_id2 = |fcc_id = |controller_num = |chip1 = SMSC;USB2507; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |pwr_optional = no |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |ports = 7 |tt = multi |power_led = red |port_led = green |flags = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |availability = |eoldate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 635145509073 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0009IIE4W |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The S/Ns of the unit populating this entry are '''CZ'''''90389088'' and '''CZ'''''90389736''. :The tag-line text on the hub's ''label'' (molded into the bottom casing) reads "Hi-Speed USB 2.0 7-Port Hub". "P81784-A" is also on the casing. :This unit is explicitly stated as a Rev. 3 unit on the casing. "F5U237-S REV:1.1/1.6mm" is silkscreened on the board w/ S/N '''CZ'''''90389088''. It appears that the power supplies included with US units are ''unbranded'' '''PS0538'''s (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.6A -> 5VDC 3.5-3.8A). I assume that these units are '''F5U237-APL-S'''es, but this may be inaccurate. ===lusb -v dump===
